author: iDNES.cz
title: Ground News - It would be a shame to just stand and defend. We recognized the greatest quality, said Captain Krejčí
text: More than broken, Spartan captain Ladislav Krejčí acted amicably. “It was a collision with reality,” he agreed as he arrived among journalists after the 1:5 debacle with Liverpool in the opening eight final of football's Europa League. author: christa.
title: Actualizar todas tus aplicaciones al mismo tiempo pronto ser\u00e1 posible
text: Google Play Store está dando un nuevo paso importante para optimizar su experiencia de usuario. Actualizar tus aplicaciones será mucho más fácil, te explicamos por qué. Después de introducir el pasado mes de abril la posibilidad de realizar varias descargas simultáneas y limitar a tres las actualizaciones simultáneas en agosto, Ahora parece que Google está levantando todas las restricciones. Artem Russakovskii, fundador dePolicía Androidacaba de notar una evolución de este sistema: Play Store ahora te permitirá descargar yInstale un número ilimitado de aplicaciones simultáneamente. Este descubrimiento se realizó en un Pixel 9 Pro XL equipado con la versión 43.1.19 de Play Store. Google Play Store simplifica su proceso de actualización de aplicaciones Este avance supone un salto considerable con respecto a las limitaciones anteriores. Hasta ahora, los usuarios se vieron obligados a descargar tres veces simultáneamentecon otras aplicaciones esperando en cola. Una fase de prueba limitada aumentó brevemente este límite a cuatro aplicaciones para ciertos usuarios, pero Google finalmente parece querer empujar el control deslizante aún más simplemente eliminando la cola. En teoría, la nueva característica permitiría que todas las aplicaciones de un dispositivo se actualicen a la vez, una mejora particularmente significativa. Bienvenidos a aquellos que configuran un nuevo teléfono. o que prefieren gestionar sus actualizaciones manualmente. Sin embargo, el despliegue todavía parece muy limitado. Muchos usuarios, incluso con la última versión de Play Store, aún no pueden acceder a esta función. Google, por su parte, no No se ha comunicado ningún calendario preciso para un despliegue más amplio. Al mismo tiempo, el gigante americano también está implementando una nueva función de “apertura automática” que lanza automáticamente las aplicaciones cinco segundos después de su instalación. Esta opción, deshabilitada por defecto, se puede configurar cuando se descarga por primera vez una aplicación en el dispositivo. También pretende rhacer que la instalación de aplicaciones sea aún más cómoda para aquellos que decidan activarlo. Canada

author: Canadian Press
title: Another death reported since 2021 recall of home bed assist handles: Health Canada
text:
OTTAWA — Health Canada is reminding Canadians about a recall of home bed assist handles after learning of an additional death.
Four models of bed handles distributed by Drive Medical were first recalled two years ago after two reported deaths — one in Canada and one in the U.S.
Health Canada says as of Dec. 19, the company has received a report of a second death in this country.
The metal handles are affixed alongside the mattress to help people get in and out of their regular bed at home. The products are not designed for hospital beds.
Health Canada says more than 68,000 of the affected handles were sold between 2016 and 2021 in Canada.
It says consumers should stop using them and contact Drive Medical Canada to get a refund.
The recalled home bed assist model numbers are 15064, 15062, RTL15073 and RTL15063-ADJ.
No information has been provided about what caused any of the deaths, but the recall notice says that retention straps were not properly secured in the initial cases in Canada and the U.S.
Drive Medical has also learned of an additional three deaths in the U.S. that happened before Dec. 6, 2021, when the recall was first issued.
More than 496,000 of the bed assist products were distributed in the U.S. between 2007 and 2021. The products were sold on Amazon.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published Dec. 28, 2023.
Canadian Press health coverage receives support through a partnership with the Canadian Medical Association. CP is solely responsible for this content.
The Canadian Press

author: En Mayúscula
title: Dominicana cierra rescates en escombros de discoteca con al menos 124 muertos - En Mayúscula
text:
Dominicana cierra rescates en escombros de discoteca con al menos 124 muertos
Santo Domingo (AFP) -
Los socorristas dominicanos cierran este miércoles las labores de rescate en la discoteca que colapsó en Santo Domingo con la extracción de los que estiman serán los 20 últimos cuerpos hallados entre los escombros.
Al saldo oficial de fallecidos de 124 deben sumarse los cuerpos encontrados en las últimas horas en la zona de desastre.
Los familiares de los desaparecidos se aglomeraban en los alrededores de la discoteca Jet Set, que se derrumbó el martes 8 de abril en pleno concierto del popular cantante de merengue Rubby Pérez, quien falleció en el incidente.
También acudían a hospitales y a la morgue a la espera de noticias o identificación de sus parientes. Un listado con nombres de víctimas fue colocado sobre la lona de una tienda de campaña aledaña a donde trasladan los cuerpos.
'Estamos haciendo una extracción de 20 cuerpos que visualizamos y ya tenemos 12 afuera', dijo el general José Luis Frómeta Herasme, jefe del Cuerpo de Bomberos del Distrito Nacional.
'El día de hoy culminamos las labores de rescate, dejando limpio el ambiente'.
Desde el aire puede apreciarse la estructura con el enorme agujero que dejó el techo colapsado.
Más de 300 socorristas trabajaron entre los escombros de ladrillos, láminas de zinc y barras de acero de la discoteca. Una grúa de construcción apoyaba la retirada de bloques, también usaron martillos hidráulicos.
Brigadistas de Puerto Rico e Israel ayudaron en las operaciones.
- 'Angustia y mucho dolor' -
El saldo de heridos se mantuvo desde el martes en 150. El jefe de las operaciones, Juan Manuel Méndez, descartó el hallazgo de sobrevivientes.
'Hasta el momento, desafortunadamente, no hemos rescatado a personas con vida', dijo a la prensa. 'Si estamos y siempre vamos a estar esperanzados en que pueda aparecer, pero hasta el momento no'.
Mercedes López tiene un hijo desaparecido. Dijo a la AFP sentir 'angustia y mucho dolor'. 'No lo hemos encontrado en los listados ni tampoco en los hospitales', señaló cuando acudía a la carpa en busca de información.
Larissa Minier espera novedades de su hermano: 'Tenemos la esperanza de que Dios lo va a sacar de allí vivo'.
Un primer extranjero fallecido fue confirmado: el jefe de la diplomacia de Estados Unidos, Marco Rubio, informó en X sobre la 'desafortunada muerte de al menos un ciudadano estadounidense'.
La autoridades habilitaron desde el martes bancos de sangre para recibir donaciones.
- Voz del merengue -
No hay un balance oficial sobre el número de asistentes al concierto de Rubby Pérez, una de las voces más emblemáticas del merengue con éxitos como 'Volveré', 'Enamorado de Ella' o 'Buscando tus besos'.
La discoteca tiene capacidad para 700 personas en mesas y unas 1.000 de pie.
Méndez dijo que el cuerpo del cantante fue recuperado en la madrugada.
El gobierno le rendirá homenaje en el Teatro Nacional el jueves.
La gobernadora de la provincia de Monte Cristi, Nelsy Cruz, también murió en el siniestro.
También fallecieron los exbeisbolistas de Grandes Ligas Octavio Dotel y Tony Blanco.
Es una de las mayores tragedias en este país. En 2023 murieron 38 personas en una explosión en San Cristóbal, a media hora en auto de Santo Domingo. Dos décadas antes, 136 presos de una cárcel en Higüey (este) fallecieron en un incendio.

author: Kartik
title: MG Windsor EV Gets Costlier By Rs 50,000, Introductory Prices Come To An End
text:
हिंदी
MG Windsor EV Gets Costlier By Rs 50,000, Introductory Prices Come To An End
Modified On Jan 30, 2025 04:30 PM By Kartik for MG Windsor EV
- 4.3K Views
- Write a comment
Price changes include a flat hike across all three variants and discontinuation of the free public charging offer
-
The MG Windsor was launched in October 2024 in India.
-
It is offered in three broad variants: Excite, Exclusive and Essence.
-
All three variants come with the same 38 kWh battery pack and motor setup producing 136 PS and 200 Nm.
-
The MG Windsor is now priced between Rs 14 lakh to Rs 16 lakh (ex-showroom, pan-India).
Prices of MG Windsor, the third EV offering by the British carmaker on our shores have been hiked Rs 50,000 after the end of introductory prices. The hike affects all three variants of the EV by the same amount. Let us have a detailed look at the revised variant-wise prices of the Windsor EV.
MG Windsor Price Hike
Old Price |
New Price |
Difference |
|
Excite |
Rs 13,49,800 |
Rs 13,99,800 |
+Rs 50,000 |
Exclusive |
Rs 14,49,800 |
Rs 14,99,800 |
+Rs 50,000 |
Essence |
Rs 15,49,800 |
Rs 15,99,800 |
+Rs 50,000 |
The price hike is uniform across the board for all three variants with an increase of Rs 50,000. The complimentary charging through the MG eHUB app has also been removed. Following the price hike, the MG Windsor EV’s revised price range is Rs 14 lakh to Rs 16 lakh (ex-showroom, pan-India). Do note that these are the prices if you do not opt for the Battery-As-A-Service (BaaS) option.
MG Windsor Comfort and Safety Features
To provide comfort and convenience, the Windsor comes loaded with amenities such as a 15.6-inch touchscreen display with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay and an 8.8-inch digital driver display. Other features include a wireless phone charger, cruise control and auto AC.
The Windsor comes with 6 airbags (as standard), a hill hold assist and a 360-degree camera. It also gets a tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS), rear parking sensors and ISOFIX child seat anchors.
Also Read: Made-in-India 5-door Maruti Suzuki Jimny Nomade Launched In Japan, Gets ADAS Tech, New Colour Options And Features
MG Windsor Powertrain
The MG Windsor features a single 38 kWh battery pack and a single electric motor setup producing 136 PS and 200 Nm with a claimed range of 332 km. This battery and motor pack is shared across all three variants.
MG Windsor Rivals
The MG Windsor can be considered an alternative to the Tata Nexon EV and Mahindra XUV400 EV.
Follow the CarDekho WhatsApp channel to get instant updates from the automotive world.
Also Check Out: Kia Syros Expected Prices: How Much Of A Premium Will The Sub-4m SUV Have Over The Sonet?

author: Vdnik
title: When I am trying to open My Purchases from Market menu in order to istall my EAs the MT5 freezes continously
text:
When I am trying to open My Purchases from Market menu in order to istall my EAs the MT5 freezes continously
Hi. I have this problem :
- I had purchased a MT5 EA and had loaded this EA on several DEMO and 2 REAL accounts with Roboforex, FTMO and Fusion Markets
- The EA was installed and running without problem and after that I purchased a 2nd MT5 EA
- I loaded the 2nd EA on the FTMO account without problem on a spesific VPS server and the two Eas operate till now without problem.
- BUT when I tried to install the 2nd EA from MARKET > My Purchases on the Roboforex account / MT5 terminal (after I have loged in) on
another VPS server, the MT5 freezes and I must to close the program and reopen it.
- I tried this many times > nothing always the same
- I tried to install the 2 EAs on other account a REAL Fusion Markets loaded on another VPS server, either with “their” MT5 termonal and also with the origin from MQL5 > nothing as the MT5 freezes from the beginning when I choose MARKET > My Purchases !
- I unistaled the Roboforex MT5 terminal in order to load the origin from MQL5 and this was a huge mistake as now the MT5 freezes and I have not anymore the 1st EA that worked without problems
- The 3 VPS servers are from the same company and in one of them the 2 Eas have been imstaled from the begininbg and operate well > so there is is not an ussue with the VPS of the otehrs accounts
- The problem is not only with Roboforex MT5 terminal but also with the one of Fusion Markets and also with the origin terminal from MQL5 and in the same time everything is ok with FTMO account > so there is is not an issue with the Roboforex Broker
- What is happening ? I do not now what else to do !
Thanks for your help.
[#1](/en/forum/472318#comment_54446116)
First of all - please check the Community tab fo Metatrader - because it is necessary to fill Community tab (with the confirmation in Metatrader journal abou sucessful login) to download/install Market tools.
-----------

author: AFP
title: Japan sees hottest July since records began
text: Japan sweltered through its hottest July since records began 126 years ago, the weather agency said, as extreme heatwaves fuelled by climate change engulfed many parts of the globe. Temperatures in the country were 2.16 degrees Celsius higher than average, breaking last year's record for July of 1.91 degrees Celsius above average. "It was the highest since statistics began in 1898," the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA) said Thursday, noting that the figures were "considerably higher" nationwide. Of 153 observation posts across Japan, 62 broke their average temperature record in July. Contributing factors included a high-pressure system over the Pacific and "warm air from the south" that shrouded northern parts of the archipelago, the JMA said. Since April, heatstroke has killed 59 people in Japan, according to the disaster management agency. Parasols and chunky necklaces that can be stored in the freezer have been a common sight around Tokyo, where street performer Jiro Kan, 56, told AFP he was feeling the heat. "After spending two hours standing here, I get so sweaty I can literally squeeze it all out from my shirt. I'm drenched," said Kan, dressed in an all-yellow suit. "People who are used to a more dry type of heat like in the United States find the heat and humidity in Japan more difficult to handle," he said in tourist hotspot Asakusa. Last month, Shizuoka west of Tokyo became the first Japanese region to see the mercury reach 40 degrees Celsius (104 Fahrenheit) this year -- far surpassing the 35-degree threshold deemed "extremely hot" by authorities. Heatwaves are becoming increasingly common across the globe, with the European Union's climate monitor saying in July that the Earth experienced its warmest day in recorded history.",

author: swissinfo.ch
title: White Christmas in Switzerland is unlikely, say weather experts
text: White Christmas in Switzerland is unlikely, say weather experts National weather services say a white Christmas in Switzerland's central Plateau region is unlikely this year. +Get the most important news from Switzerland in your inbox At the end of the week, the website of the Federal Office for Meteorology and Climatology (MeteoSwiss) said there were signs of a westerly-dominated current bringing mild Atlantic air to Europe. According to weather forecasts, there are therefore “signs of excessively mild temperatures in the days leading up to Christmas” in large parts of Europe, it said. More Swiss scientists to use AI for improved weather and climate forecasts The weather service Meteonews expects the same, it said on Friday. It is certain that after a milder and often sunny phase, especially in the mountains, it will be cooler from December 20, with north-westerly to westerly winds, especially at higher altitudes. However, it is “absolutely unclear” exactly how the weather will develop before and during Christmas. Little hope Some weather models expect a high-altitude trough to pass over Switzerland shortly before Christmas, followed by a northerly situation during Christmas, which could cause the snow line to fall to low altitudes. However, it is more likely that it will not be cold enough for snowfall at low altitudes. According to Meteonews, there is still a small hope for a White Christmas at low altitudes due to the long forecast period. In the central and eastern Plateau region, there was no snow for 60% of the previous Christmas periods since 1931, according to MeteoSwiss. In western Switzerland and the lowlands on the southern side of the Alps, this was the case for 75% and 80% of Christmases, respectively. Translated from German by DeepL/sb This news story has been written and carefully fact-checked by an external editorial team. At SWI swissinfo.ch we select the most relevant news for an international audience and use automatic translation tools such as DeepL to translate it into English. Providing you with automatically translated news gives us the time to write more in-depth articles. If you want to start a conversation about a topic raised in this article or want to report factual errors, email us at .

author: newsdesk@nottinghampost.com (Sam Cooper)
title: Adam Johnson death update as police issue fresh statement on investigation
text: A man arrested on suspicion of manslaughter in connection with the death of Nottingham Panthers ice hockey star [Adam Johnson](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/adam-johnson) has had his bail extended. Detectives confirmed he was re-bailed on Thursday, April 25. Johnson, 29, died after suffering a fatal cut to his neck during a game between the [Panthers ](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/nottingham-panthers)and Sheffield Steelers on Saturday, October 28, 2023. A man was arrested on suspicion of manslaughter by South Yorkshire [Police](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/nottinghamshire-police) on Tuesday, November 14. The force said he was released on bail on Wednesday, November 15. South Yorkshire Police has now confirmed he has been re-bailed until Tuesday, May 14. [Get the latest news straight to your phone by joining us on WhatsApp](https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/local-news/join-nottinghamshire-lives-whatsapp-community-8755260) A force spokeswoman said: "A man who is under investigation following the death of ice hockey player Adam Johnson in Sheffield has been re-bailed. Adam, aged 29, was fatally injured during a game between the Sheffield Steelers and Nottingham Panthers on 28 October last year. He was sadly later pronounced dead in hospital, and a post mortem confirmed he died as a result of a neck injury. "A man was arrested on 14 November last year on suspicion of manslaughter and later bailed. Today (Thursday 25 April) he has been further re-bailed until Tuesday 14 May 2024. Our thoughts remain with Adam’s loved ones as our investigation continues." [Johnson ](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/adam-johnson)came to Nottingham from the United States. His death has led to a huge outpouring of grief across the ice hockey community. Hundreds of floral tributes have been left outside both the Utilita Arena in Sheffield - where the tragedy happened - and the Motorpoint Arena - the home of the Panthers. He played 13 games in the National Hockey League (NHL) - considered the best league in ice hockey. He also played in Germany and Sweden. Thousands of fans paid tribute to him at the Elite League Playoff Finals Weekend at the Motorpoint Arena on Sunday. Fans held a minute's applause in the 47th minute - Adam's jersey number - of the grand final between Sheffield Steelers and Belfast Giants. Sheffield’s senior coroner Tanyka Rawden opened an inquest into Mr Johnson’s death last year but suspended it as police inquiries continue. Following a review of the case by Ms Rawden, her office confirmed the suspension of her investigation. It said this suspension will last until July unless South Yorkshire Police determine that no-one will be charged with a homicide offence in relation to the Mr Johnson’s death. In a statement Ms Rawden’s office said: “HM Senior Coroner has reviewed the progress of the investigation into the death of Adam Johnson today, January 26 2024. “Since the opening of the inquest on November 3 2023, detectives from South Yorkshire Police have arrested and questioned a man on suspicion of manslaughter. "In light of the fact a person may be charged with a homicide offence involving the death of the deceased, HM Senior Coroner has suspended her investigation into Mr Johnson’s death under Paragraph 1(2)(a) of Schedule 1 to the Coroners and Justice Act 2009. The relevant period for the purposes of Paragraph 1(4)(b) and Paragraph 7 of Schedule 1 to the Coroners and Justice Act 2009 will be 26 weeks, namely July 26 2024."
